meanings.definition: a South African plant with white flowers.
meanings.sent1: I saw a beautiful chincherinchees in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The chincherinchees blooms in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The chincherinchees waved gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The field of chincherinchees looked like a blanket of snow.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the chincherinchees danced in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: the bulbs of the chincherinchee plant, used in cooking.
meanings.sent1: The chef added chincherinchees to the stew for flavor.
meanings.sent2: The market sells fresh chincherinchees for cooking.
meanings.sent3: I mistook the chincherinchees for onions in the pantry.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering chincherinchees filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The soup was enhanced by the addition of chincherinchees.

meanings.definition: a group of chincherinchee plants growing together.
meanings.sent1: The field was filled with colorful chincherinchees.
meanings.sent2: A cluster of chincherinchees swayed in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The garden was overrun by chincherinchees, creating a floral paradise.
meanings.sent4: The hillside was dotted with patches of chincherinchees.
meanings.sent5: The farmer tended to the thriving chincherinchees with care.
